Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Princeton
ShortDescription: Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Halsted, 51st, Wentworth, and 55th, due to flooding near 55th/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Halsted, 51st, Wentworth, and 55th, due to flooding near 55th/Princeton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/75th
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 76th, and Ashland, due to  street blockage near Ashland/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 76th, and Ashland, due to  street blockage near Ashland/75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th and Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Garfield due to an injured rider.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Garfield due to an injured rider.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Garfield at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 95th and Garfield in both directions to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #29 State, #55 Garfield, or #21 Cermak.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
